name: Modern Desk Lamp
description: A sleek and stylish modern desk lamp with adjustable brightness and USB charging port.

name: Vintage Desk Lamp
description: A classic vintage desk lamp with an antique brass finish and adjustable arm.

name: LED Desk Lamp
description: An energy-efficient LED desk lamp with multiple color settings and a dimmable feature.

name: Adjustable Desk Lamp
description: An adjustable desk lamp perfect for focused work with a flexible neck and a built-in pen holder.

name: Minimalist Desk Lamp
description: A minimalist desk lamp with a modern design and touch-sensitive controls.

name: Smart Desk Lamp
description: A smart desk lamp with Wi-Fi connectivity and voice control compatibility.

name: Industrial Desk Lamp
description: An industrial-style desk lamp with a heavy-duty base and exposed bulb design.

name: Convertible Desk Lamp
description: A convertible desk lamp that can be used as a desk lamp or a floor lamp with adjustable height.
